messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to exchange a helmet I purchased for a medium-sized, red, high ventilation type. Also, I want to exchange a luggage set from another order to a two-piece black one with soft material. Lastly, I just ordered a grill, and I want to modify it to be the same type as the one I already received. Can you assist me with these requests?

message.content: Hello! I would like to exchange a helmet I purchased for a medium-sized, red, high ventilation type. Lastly, I just ordered a grill, and I want to modify it to be the same type as the one I already received. Can you assist me with these requests?
